body.name: Vintage Flower Table Lamp for Bedroom,‎ 3 Colors Adjustable Lily of The Valley Bedside Lamp with E26 Bulb Gooseneck Nightstand Lamp for Living Room Office Reading
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 mins
features: 💡 ELEGANT FLOWER SHAPE DESIGN - Retaining much of its vintage simplicity, this floral table bedside lamp is perfect for a variety of interiors, with an innate elegance and warmth that makes it the highlight of any room. Its slim and sleek gooseneck stand not only allows for flexible angle adjustment, but also adds a modern and sophisticated touch to your space. The soft green hue complements a variety of interior styles, adding a fresh and serene touch to your home or office.

💡 FLEXIBLE GOOSENECK STAND ADJUSTMENT - The Green Flower Table Lamp offers a truly personalized lighting experience. With the flexible gooseneck bracket design, you can effortlessly adjust the angle and direction of the light to your personal preference. Whether you prefer focused task lighting or subtle ambient light, simply position the shade for the perfect angle of illumination. Feel free to create your ideal atmosphere with our versatile adjustable table lamps.

💡 3 COLOR TEMPERATURES TO CUSTOMIZE - Our Green Flower Table Lamp comes with an E26 bulb that offers 3 adjustable color temperature settings, including warm, cool white and neutral light. With the flick of a switch, you can change the ambiance of your space to suit your mood or activity, allowing you to feel comfortable at any point in the day. With adjustable color temperature, our table lamps can enhance your space and enjoy a personalized lighting experience.

💡 MULTI-SITUATION LIGHTING EXPERIENCE - Our Green Floral Table Nightstand Lamp isn't just for the bedside, its versatility allows you to place it on any table or surface. Whether it's a desk, side table, or even a bookshelf, this table lamp will effortlessly add an element of style and practicality to any area. Whether it's a cozy reading area or a quiet corner, let our table lamps illuminate your favorite places in the most elegant and versatile way possible.

💡 ENERGY EFFICIENT LIGHTING OPTION - The Flower Table Bedside Lamp comes with a high quality E26 LED bulb, eliminating the need to purchase one separately. With up to 800 lumens of light, the included LED bulb provides ample illumination for your workspace, reading area, or bedside.The LED bulb is not only bright and warm, but it is also energy efficient, which helps you save energy and reduce your electric bill.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fantastic Modern Floral Bedside Lamp We chose the tea-green color, not just for its serene beauty but for the calmness it inspires. The goose-neck design, reminiscent of an elegant swan, bends and adjusts freely at a 360-degree angle, allowing you to create an atmosphere as unique as your imagination. This isn't just a table lamp, it's a canvas for your creativity, a medium to express your distinct taste in decor.

360° SWIVEL GOOSENECK BRACKET DESIGN Experience personalized lighting like never before with our Green Flower Table Bedside Lamp. This exquisite lamp allows you to tailor the lighting to your exact liking. Thanks to its innovative 360° swivel neck design, you can effortlessly adjust the angle and direction of the light to suit your preference. Illuminate your space with focused task lighting or create a cozy ambiance with gentle, ambient light.
Perfect Decor Piece for Any Room, Living Room, Bedroom，Study, or Office

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I adore this lamp, it looks so cute and I like the adjustable lighting. The lampshade is plastic but doesn't cheapen the overall look and aesthetician of the lamp, 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet and Dainty Flower Light
reviews.reviewText: I love this flower room for my daughter's room. It is beautiful and a nice metal quality. The perfect accent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy with a Gumby neck.
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty cool little lamp. The neck is so flexible, and green, it really did remind me of Gumby. It has a nice, stable metal base so it will stay put. The on/off switch is on the cord, but it is located at a convenient spot on the cord, not too far down. The cord itself is very short, so unless you're putting it right by a plug, you will likely need an extension cord. A lightbulb is included, and the function is very clever. Each time you turn off the lamp and turn it back on, the dimness of the lightbulb changes. There are 3 different settings, and the last one is the warmest light and the dimmest. So why, oh why, are all the settings too bright for me? I truly believe the world will go mad from all this white light; it is simply not natural.Aside from the lightbulb, and that may be a "just me" thing, what really lets this lamp down is the shade. Okay, it's plastic and I knew that going in, but does it really need to look so darn cheap? Truly, it is not a pretty shade, and I would be happy to spend several more bucks for a more attractive plastic one, LOL.Overall, it's a very cute and functional lamp which I will use with the flower facing down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this
reviews.reviewText: Just what I wanted and need. Two lamp and an extra outlet. They are prefect! Live them have three levels of brightness 🌞.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've bought lamps for this type of price before that were vastly better than this. Some people might say you get what you paid for, but this is not even worth what it was paid for. It's nice that the stem of the lamp is flexible and I don't mind that the lamp shade is plastic. I mind that there are spots on the lampshade where the plastic has marks in it. The lamp shade is just poorly made.What is vastly worse is that the lamp died almost instantly. I plugged it in, and within approximately 30 minutes the lamp died and was no longer working. It didn't work with a different light bulb. It didn't work plugged in elsewhere. It just didn't work. It was an instant return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp I put it in my bedroom nightstand very pretty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Perfect choice for me! Love the way the touch on/off works. It has three choices for brightness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This light is bright enough to do surgery -- outdoors.
reviews.reviewText: The first one I ordered came and it's on off switch worked fine, but it didn't dim or change the mood of color. The replacement had the same on off switch, but with each time I turned the lamp back on it came back with a different hue. First hue is white, second is blue and third is yellow. This are very light. The light itself is really piercing in it's brightness. Not kidding about being able to do surgery with it -- outdoors. I finally put a 25 watt painted yellow party bulb in to get the brightness to a point I could look at the light without being blinded. After looking at it with it's special bulb (the light bulb meant for it that came with the lamp) my eyes have black spots in front of them for a while.The lamp itself is quite beautiful. One must be somewhat mindful when moving the "stem" part around, as it has to balance and not tip over when you let go of it.Unsure if I would get it again. It's beautiful but it's blinding, even when the 3 hues are available.
